xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/persistence" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/persistence http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/persistence/persistence_2_1.xsd" version="2.1">
SELECT c.id AS countryId, c.name AS countryName, COUNT(u.id) AS projectCount FROM country c LEFT JOIN "_address" a ON c.id = a.fk_country LEFT JOIN "_project" p ON a.id = p.fk_address LEFT JOIN "_user" u ON p.fk_user = u.id AND u.active = true AND u.enabled = true GROUP BY c.id, c.name HAVING COUNT(u.id) > 0 ORDER BY projectCount DESC;
